<a id="MenuBar"></a>

# MenuBar

**Inherits:** [Control](Control.md) **\<** [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A horizontal menu bar that creates a menu for each [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md) child.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A horizontal menu bar that creates a menu for each [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md) child. New items are created by adding [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md)\\ s to this node. Item title is determined by [Window.title](Window.md#Window_property_title), or node name if [Window.title](Window.md#Window_property_title) is empty. Item title can be overridden using [set_menu_title()](MenuBar.md#MenuBar_method_set_menu_title).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="MenuBar_property_flat"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **flat** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_property_flat)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_flat**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_flat**\ (\ )

Flat **MenuBar** don't display item decoration.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_property_language"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[String](String.md) **language** = `""` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_property_language)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_language**\ (\ value\: [String](String.md)\ )
- [String](String.md) **get_language**\ (\ )

Language code used for line-breaking and text shaping algorithms, if left empty current locale is used instead.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_property_prefer_global_menu"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **prefer_global_menu** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_property_prefer_global_menu)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_prefer_global_menu**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_prefer_global_menu**\ (\ )

If ``true``, **MenuBar** will use system global menu when supported.

\ **Note:** If ``true`` and global menu is supported, this node is not displayed, has zero size, and all its child nodes except [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md)\\ s are inaccessible.

\ **Note:** This property overrides the value of the [PopupMenu.prefer_native_menu](PopupMenu.md#PopupMenu_property_prefer_native_menu) property of the child nodes.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_property_start_index"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **start_index** = `-1` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_property_start_index)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_start_index**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_start_index**\ (\ )

Position order in the global menu to insert **MenuBar** items at. All menu items in the **MenuBar** are always inserted as a continuous range. Menus with lower [start_index](MenuBar.md#MenuBar_property_start_index) are inserted first. Menus with [start_index](MenuBar.md#MenuBar_property_start_index) equal to ``-1`` are inserted last.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_property_switch_on_hover"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **switch_on_hover** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_property_switch_on_hover)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_switch_on_hover**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **is_switch_on_hover**\ (\ )

If ``true``, when the cursor hovers above menu item, it will close the current [PopupMenu](PopupMenu.md) and open the other one.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_property_text_direction"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[TextDirection](Control.md#enum_Control_TextDirection) **text_direction** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_property_text_direction)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_text_direction**\ (\ value\: [TextDirection](Control.md#enum_Control_TextDirection)\ )
- [TextDirection](Control.md#enum_Control_TextDirection) **get_text_direction**\ (\ )

Base text writing direction.

<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-method -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_native_menu**\ (\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_method_is_native_menu)

Returns ``true``, if system global menu is supported and used by this **MenuBar**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_method_set_disable_shortcuts"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_disable_shortcuts**\ (\ disabled\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_method_set_disable_shortcuts)

If ``true``, shortcuts are disabled and cannot be used to trigger the button.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_method_set_menu_disabled"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **set_menu_hidden**\ (\ menu\: [int](int.md), hidden\: [bool](bool.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_method_set_menu_hidden)

If ``true``, menu item is hidden.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

## Theme Property Descriptions

<a id="MenuBar_theme_color_font_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **font_color** = `Color(0.875, 0.875, 0.875, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_theme_color_font_color)

Default text [Color](Color.md) of the menu item.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_theme_color_font_disabled_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **font_disabled_color** = `Color(0.875, 0.875, 0.875, 0.5)` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_theme_color_font_disabled_color)

Text [Color](Color.md) used when the menu item is disabled.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_theme_color_font_focus_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **font_focus_color** = `Color(0.95, 0.95, 0.95, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_theme_color_font_focus_color)

Text [Color](Color.md) used when the menu item is focused. Only replaces the normal text color of the menu item. Disabled, hovered, and pressed states take precedence over this color.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_theme_color_font_hover_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **font_hover_color** = `Color(0.95, 0.95, 0.95, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_theme_color_font_hover_color)

Text [Color](Color.md) used when the menu item is being hovered.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_theme_color_font_hover_pressed_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **font_hover_pressed_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_theme_color_font_hover_pressed_color)

Text [Color](Color.md) used when the menu item is being hovered and pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_theme_color_font_outline_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **font_outline_color** = `Color(0, 0, 0, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_theme_color_font_outline_color)

The tint of text outline of the menu item.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_theme_color_font_pressed_color"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Color](Color.md) **font_pressed_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_theme_color_font_pressed_color)

Text [Color](Color.md) used when the menu item is being pressed.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_theme_constant_h_separation"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **h_separation** = `4` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_theme_constant_h_separation)

The horizontal space between menu items.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_theme_constant_outline_size"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **outline_size** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_theme_constant_outline_size)

The size of the text outline.

\ **Note:** If using a font with [FontFile.multichannel_signed_distance_field](FontFile.md#FontFile_property_multichannel_signed_distance_field) enabled, its [FontFile.msdf_pixel_range](FontFile.md#FontFile_property_msdf_pixel_range) must be set to at least *twice* the value of [outline_size](MenuBar.md#MenuBar_theme_constant_outline_size) for outline rendering to look correct. Otherwise, the outline may appear to be cut off earlier than intended.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_theme_font_font"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[Font](Font.md) **font** [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_theme_font_font)

[Font](Font.md) of the menu item's text.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="MenuBar_theme_font_size_font_size"></a>

<!-- classref-themeproperty -->

[int](int.md) **font_size** [ðŸ”—](#MenuBar_theme_font_size_font_size)

Font size of the menu item's text.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>
